name: Splunk
title: splunk.com
shortDescription: Splunk provides a platform for monitoring, searching, analyzing, and visualizing machine-generated data. It is designed for IT and security professionals, offering solutions like security information and event management (SIEM) and IT operations analytics. An example use case is a company using Splunk to detect and respond to security threats in real time, enhancing their cybersecurity posture.
cons: Higher cost for larger data volumes
